body:
`build_process` has been around a long time but it's become a very large, unwieldy method. It's hard to work with because it has a lot of local variables that need to persist across all of the code.

- [x] To address this, convert it its own `BuildInfoProcess` class.
- [x] Start breaking the method apart by factoring out the main installation logic into its own function.
title: refactor: convert `build_process` to use `BuildProcessInstaller`
